verses.name: Numbers 11:27
verses.text: And there ran a young man, and told Moses, and said, Eldad and Medad do prophesy in the camp.

verses.name: Numbers 11:28
verses.text: And Joshua the son of Nun, the servant of Moses, one of his young men, answered and said, My lord Moses, forbid them.

verses.name: Numbers 11:29
verses.text: And Moses said unto him, Enviest thou for my sake? would God that all the Lord’s people were prophets, and that the Lord would put his spirit upon them!

verses.name: Numbers 11:30
verses.text: And Moses gat him into the camp, he and the elders of Israel.
